snippet: Andy Murray, the world's new top-ranked men's player, has been drawn in a group with Stan Wawrinka, Kei Nishikori and Maric Cilic for the ATP finals....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray, the world's new top-ranked men's player, has been drawn in a group with Stan Wawrinka, Kei Nishikori and Maric Cilic for the ATP finals.

headline.print_headline: Murray Grouped With Wawrinka, Nishikori, Cilic at ATP Finals
headline.main: Murray Grouped With Wawrinka, Nishikori, Cilic at ATP Finals
